data.eml:eml: Revisionary notes on the fungus-growing ants of the genus Cyphomyrmex, rimosus-group (Hymenoptera: Formicidae: Attini).

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original book chapter Snelling, R. R., Longino, J. T. (1992): Revisionary notes on the fungus-growing ants of the genus Cyphomyrmex, rimosus-group (Hymenoptera: Formicidae: Attini). In: Quintero, D., Aiello, A. (Eds): Insects of Panama and Mesoamerica: selected studies. Oxford: Oxford University Press: 479-494, URL: http://osuc.biosci.ohio-state.edu/HymOnline/reference-full.html?id=13137
